channel.title: Comments on: UCSF Library’s eScholarship Site

item.title: By: Anneliese Taylor
item.dc:creator: Anneliese Taylor
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2017/06/16/ucsf-librarys-escholarship-site/#comment-671">Sarah McClung</a>.
Good question. Yes, eScholarship is meant for the work of UC employees, so it should be limited to your work while at UCSF.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sarah McClung.

Good question. Yes, eScholarship is meant for the work of UC employees, so it should be limited to your work while at UCSF.

item.title: By: Sarah McClung
item.dc:creator: Sarah McClung
item.description: Should our submissions be limited to work we've done since we started working at UCSF?
item.content:encoded: Should our submissions be limited to work we’ve done since we started working at UCSF?
